name: Beyond Death 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In this Run'n'Gun you play as Lyra, a human isolated on an exoplanet. Infected by a Parasite, you gradually mutate into a powerful monster, which gradually turns the game into a Beat Them all. Will you sacrifice your humanity in order to survive?

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 1

Producer : Mathilde DEJOUY
Game Design : Gabriel PERIER and Florian PIETTE
Game Art : Delphine JANNOT, Ségolène MAURICE and Angie WOLNICZAK
Game Design & Programming : Théo TOUATY
Game Programming : Florent LEGER
Music & Sound Design : Laurent KEROMNES
